column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ Israelhen Hosea
column3: Ela ne ba no n'afe a otsia ebiasa no mu no
column4: nna Judahen Ahaz ne ba Hezekia hyɛɛ ase dzii hen."

column2: "Aber a ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu enum; na odzii hen mfe eduonu akron wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Abi
column3: Zekaria ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ dza n'egya David yɛe no tse nyinara."

column2: "Ɔno na oyiyii mbea sorɔnsorɔm
column3: na obubuu edum no
column4: na otwitwaa Asera no gui: na obubuu boran abowatsena a Moses yɛe no mu esinesin; osiandɛ ɔdze bodu nda no mu no nna Israelmba hyew eduhuam ma no; nna wɔfrɛ no Nehusitan."

column2: "Ɔdze no werɛ hyɛɛ EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no mu; ma n'ekyir obiara nntse dɛ ɔno wɔ Juda ahemfo nyinara mu
column4: nkyii so wɔ hɔn a wodzii n'enyim no mu."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔdze noho bataa EWURADZE ho
column3: oenngyaa n'ekyir dzi
column4: mbom odzii ne mbrasɛm a ɔnoara EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dzii n'ekyir; beebiara a ofiir edzi kɔree no ɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm: na ɔtseew etua wɔ Asiriahen no do
column3: na ɔannsom no."

column2: "Ɔno na okunkum Filistiafo no kodur Gaza na n'ahe do
column3: ofi aweɔmfo abantsentsen ho dze kodu kurow a wɔagye no ban no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Hezekia n'afe a otsia anan no a ɔyɛ Israelhen Hosea
column3: Ela ne ba no n'afe a otsia esuon no mu no
column4: na Asiriahen Salmanesar fowee baa Samaria do

column2: "Na mfe ebiasa n'ewiei no nna wɔgyee: mekyerɛ Hezekia n'afe a otsia esia no a ɔyɛ Israelhen Hosea n'afe a otsia akron no mu no
column3: nna wɔgyee Samaria fae."

column2: "Na Asiriahen no faa Israel kɔr Asiria
column3: na ɔdze hɔn koguu Hala

column2: "osiandɛ woenntsie hɔn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ne ndze
column3: mbom wɔtoo n'ahyɛmu
column4: mekyerɛ dza EWURADZE n'akowaa Moses hyɛe no nyinara

column2: "Afei ɔhen Hezekia n'afe a otsia duanan no mu no na Asiriahen Senakerib fowee baa Juda nkurow a wɔagyegye ho ban no nyinara do
column3: na ɔbɛgyee fae."

column2: "Na Judahen Hezekia somae ma wɔkɔr Asiriahen no hɔ wɔ Lakis
column3: dɛ
column4: Mayɛ bɔn; san fi mo do: dza edze bɔto mo do no mobɔsoa. Na Asiriahen no twae maa Judahen Hezekia dɛ ontua dwetɛ  talent   ahaasa na sika  talent   eduasa."

column2: "Na Hezekia dze dwetɛ a wohun no wɔ EWURADZE ne fie nyinara maa no."
"Aber no mu na Hezekia twitwaa EWURADZE n'asɔrfi no mbobow ho
column3: na edum a Judahen Hezekia duraduraa ho no

column2: "Na Asiriahen no somaa Tartan na Rab-saris na Rabsake ma wofi Lakis nye dɔm kɛsenara kɔr ɔhen Hezekia nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm. Na wɔfowee baa Jerusalɛm. Na aber a wɔfowee bae no
column3: wobegyinaa etsifi nsutaae a ɔwɔ ɔtanhofo haban no ne tsempɔn do

column2: "Na aber a wokehyiia ɔhen no
column3: nna Hilkia ne ba Eliakim a ɔhwɛ fidua no do no
column5: na Asaf ne ba ɔsɛnkaafo Joa

column2: "Na Rabsake see hɔn dɛ
column3: Afei hom nka nkyerɛ Hezekia dɛ
column6: Awerɛhyɛmu bɛn nye iyi a edze wo werɛ ahyɛ mu yi?"

column2: "Ɔwo eka dze na ɔyɛ nsɛnhun
column3: Dɛ ɔsa ho egyinatu na ahoɔdzen wɔ wo hɔ. Afei woana na etwer no
column4: ma atsew mo do etua yi?"

column2: "Afei
column3: hwɛ
column5: ɔtse dɛ ndzɛmbir a ebu yi no poma do
column6: ɔno no do na nyimpa bi twer a
column8: na ohwira mu: mbrɛ Egypthen Farao tse dze ma hɔn a wɔtwer no nyinara nye no."

column2: "Na sɛ hom se me dɛ
column3: Yɛtwer EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn a: ana nnyɛ ɔno na Hezekia eyiyi ne mbea sorɔnsorɔm na n'afɔrmbukyia
column4: na ɔase Juda na Jerusalɛm dɛ
column5: Afɔrmbukyia yi enyim wɔ Jerusalɛm na hom nsɔr no?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: meserɛ wo
column4: enye mo wura Asiriahen no nkyiakyia
column6: kyerɛ dɛ w'afamu ibotum ama nyimpa atsenatsena hɔn do a."

column2: "Na ibodua dɛn na etum adan mo wura no nkowaa nketseaba mu ɔsafohen kor n'enyi
column3: na osian ntseaseanam na mpɔnkɔdofo ntsi

column2: "Ana edween dɛ mekwetsir EWURADZE na maba bea yi do dɛ merebɛsɛɛ no? EWURADZE na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Fow kɔ asaase yi do

column2: "Na Hilkia ne ba Eliakim
column3: na Sebna
column7: kasa kyerɛ wo nkowaa wɔ Siria kasa mu; na yɛtse: na mma nnye hɛn nnkasa wɔ Judafo kasaa mu
column8: wɔ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ fasu do no asomu."

column2: "Na Rabsake see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana mo wura somaa me dɛ membɛka asɛm yi nkyerɛ wo wura
column4: na ɔwo a? Ana nnyɛ mbarimba a wɔtsetse fasu do no nkyɛn na ɔsomaa me bi a
column5: hɔn a hɔn so wobedzi hɔnankasa hɔn egyanan
column6: na wɔanom hɔnankasa hɔn ase nsu dɛ homara no?"

column2: "Nna Rabsake gyinae
column3: na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu wɔ Judafo kasaa mu

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔhen se nye yi
column3: Mma hom mma Hezekia ndaadaa hom; na orunntum nngye hom mmfi ne nsamu:"

column2: "nkyii so mma mma Hezekia mma hom nntwer EWURADZE
column3: dɛ
column5: na wɔremmfa kurow yi nnhyɛ Asiriahen nsa."

column2: "Mma hom nntsie Hezekia: na mbrɛ Asiriahen no se nye yi
column3: Hom nye me ndzi no hom abodweesɛm mu; na hom mfir edzi mbra me nkyɛn; na hom mu obiara ndzi no wenyindua
column5: na hom mu obiara nnom nankasa no bura mu nsu;"

column2: "nkodu dɛ mebɛba m'abɛfa hom akɔ asaase a ɔtse dɛ homankasa hom asaase yi do
column3: eburow na nsa asaase
column7: na hom eennwu: na mma hom nntsie Hezekia

column2: "Ana amanaman enyame no mu biara agye n'asaase efi Asiriahen nsamu pɛn?"
"Hamat na Arpad enyame no wɔwɔ henfa? Sefarvaim
column3: Hena
column4: na Iva enyame no wɔwɔ henfa? Ana wɔagye Samaria efi me nsamu a?"

column2: "Amanaman enyame nyinara mu woananom na wɔagye hɔn man efi me nsamu
column3: ma EWURADZE rebɛgye Jerusalɛm efi me nsamu yi?"

column2: "Na ɔman no kaa hɔn ano too mu
column3: na woemmbua no asɛm biara: osiandɛ ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm nye dɛ

column2: "Nna Hilkia ne ba Eliakim a ɔhwɛ fidua no do no
column3: na ɔkyerɛwfo Sebna
column4: na Asaf ne ba ɔsɛnkaafo Joa
column5: dze hɔn ntar a wɔatsetsew mu baa Hezekia nkyɛn
column6: na wɔbɛkaa Rabsake ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no."
